constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 从 n 个元素中选择 p 个作为球员，k 个作为观众，且 p + k ≤ n
constraints.formal: select P ⊆ N and A ⊆ N such that |P| = p, |A| = k, and |P ∪ A| = p + k ≤ n

constraints.name: exclusion
constraints.description: 每个元素最多只能被选为球员或观众之一
constraints.formal: ∀i ∈ N, i ∈ P → i ∉ A and i ∈ A → i ∉ P

constraints.name: permutation_constraint
constraints.description: 必须恰好选择 p 个不同位置的球员，每个位置一个
constraints.formal: select exactly one player for each of the p positions
